page.topic: How to Dynamically Add Panels to a Panel Navigator
page.description: Panels (Panel Cards, Panel Layouts, and child Panel Navigators) can be dynamically added to a Panel Navigator at run-time.
page.discussion: When you create UX component that uses a Panel Navigator, the Panels (Cards, Layouts, and child Navigators) in the Panel Navigator are usually created at design-time. It is not required, however, that the Panels in a Panel Navigator be created at design time.

section.description: You can create Panels at run-time and dynamically add them to the Panel Navigator. The Panel Navigator's *[js:.addPanel()]* method can be called to add Panels. Similarly, you can remove Panels from a Panel Navigator at run-time.
Watch the videos below to learn more about how to dynamically add Panels to a Panel Navigator.
